itemDescription: Indian Army officer and British Army general

wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Hugh Anthony Prince CBE (11 August 1911 – 6 November 2005) was an Indian Army and British Army officer who became Chief of the Military Planning Office for the Southeast Asia Treaty Organization.

response: * Major-General Hugh Anthony Prince CBE, Indian Army and British Army officer
* Brigadier (temporary) Hugh Anthony Prince (380188), late Infantry.
